title: When do we get Black Market Brawlers?
body: It's said "Act III 0 Days" since wednesday morning.

replies.body:
It's out now it's a new game mode you buy the mercs upgrade them and yeah they will replace normal minions for the rest of the game, when you buy the merc and upgrade that is. Other than that there are items within the black market that may help you or disadvantage the other team players.

I kinda just did my first game as Miss Fortune and I kinda found the game mode pointless. The new items see ok but didn't really have to use the,. The mercs are great but you can only pick one and upgrade everything such as giving it more defence or attack. But yeah that's practically it. :/
